text: This is a list of the rivers of Fiji. They are listed by island in clockwise order, starting at the north end of each island. Tributaries are listed under the parent stream. ==Gau== *Wailevu River (Gau) ==Ovalau== *Lovoni River ==Taveuni== *Waimbula River (Taveuni) *Tavoro Creek *Somosomo Creek ==Vanua Levu== *Nakura River *Nanggerenggere River *Lakemba River *Vuniyaro River *Nasoni River *Korotasere River *Vaturova River *Nala River **Koroivonu River *Timbitimbi River *Mbutha River (Buca River) *Kasavu River *Mataniwai River *Ngalongalo River *Nasekawa River **Ndrakaniwai River *Natoavou River *Navilangolango River *Yanawai River *Kilaka River *Mbonda River *Suetambu River *Wainunu River **Navilevu River
